questions.question: What is the predominant color of the upper part of this athletic shoe?
What material appears to constitute the majority of the shoe's upper?
Describe the color of the midsole, contrasting with the upper section?
What is the apparent texture of the knitted upper, smooth or patterned?
Considering the lacing system, what type of laces are used?
What color are the laces, matching or contrasting with the shoe?
Considering the sole's shape, would you characterize it as curved or flat?
What is the overall shape of the shoe, pointed or rounded?
Describe the construction of the shoe's heel counter, high or low?
Does the shoe exhibit any visible branding or logos?
Judging by the image, what is the style of this athletic shoe?
What is the general appearance of the sole's outer edge?
What is the construction of the shoe's tongue, visible or integrated?
Observing the laces' insertion, is it through eyelets or directly into the upper?
Considering the shoe's structure, is there any prominent reinforcement stitching visible?
